mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID_NO, ORDER_ID, REVIEW_CONTENTS) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userIdNo}, (SELECT o.ORDER_ID FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.ORDER_ID = op.ORDER_ID WHERE o.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND op.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM review r WHERE r.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID) ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE DESC LIMIT 1), #{reviewContents} )

INSERT INTO review (PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID_NO, ORDER_ID, REVIEW_CONTENTS) VALUES (#{review.productId}, #{review.userIdNo}, (select o.ORDER_ID from orders o JOIN order_product op on o.ORDER_ID = op.ORDER_ID WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber} AND op.PRODUCT_ID = #{review.productId}), #{review.reviewContents})
mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_ID, u.USER_NAME, r.REVIEW_CONTENTS, r.REVIEW_CREATED_AT FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.USER_ID_NO = u.USER_ID_NO WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_product op LEFT JOIN review r ON (r.PRODUCT_ID = op.PRODUCT_ID AND r.ORDER_ID = op.ORDER_ID) WHERE r.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND op.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId};

mapper.update: UPDATE review SET REVIEW_CONTENTS = #{updateContents} WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}
